title: Botsync brings in investment from SGInnovate to continue scaling robots, software
description:
Botsync is expanding deployments of its mobile robots and orchestration software throughout Asia-Pacific with support from Singapore.

The post Botsync brings in investment from SGInnovate to continue scaling robots, software appeared first on The Robot Report.
